name: v3.4.5
body:
- Fixed a bug where the platform logo would reappear when the screen was rotated
- Hide the options for the live wallpaper if the device does not support setting a live wallpaper.

name: v3.4.3
body: - Added support for displays up to 18.5:9 and devices with cutouts

name: v3.4.1
body: - Fix crash when trying to change octopus size

name: v3.4.0
body:
- Allow sending feedback on non-alpha builds
- Add option to open Ocquarium alpha from about screen
- Allow hiding navigation bar
- New settings color scheme
- New octopus size selection screen
- Allow setting random background gradient colors
- Fix settings back button not working in certain devices
- Increase transparent settings icon size
- Added Russian translation

name: v3.3.0
body:
- Change settings structure and design
- New about page, with added ability to send feedback.

name: v3.2.1
body: - Fix application crash when v2 platform logo was enabled on pre-Nougat devices due to improper preference removal beforehand.

name: v3.2
body:
- Android 8.1 Oreo light / dark theme wallpaper support
- Allow disabling touch for the screensaver

name: v3.1
body:
- Allow changing octopus blinking frequency
- Show the Android Oreo logo before opening Ocquarium

name: v3.0.3
body: - The reset background color option is now disabled when the colors are default. (See #21)

name: v3.0.2
body:
- Fixed a bug where the app would crash if no octopus size was entered
- Limit the octopus size to a maximum of 500%
- APK now signed with both v1 and v2 signing schemes

name: v3.0.1
body: - Fix screensaver settings not opening on some devices

name: v3.0
body:
- Added live wallpaper functionality
- Fixed the octopus' mouth
- Allow resetting background color to default
- Allow hiding the settings icon
- Miscellaneous bug fixes

name: v2.2
body:
- Added a settings icon in the top left of the app to change preferences.
- Make the settings icon change light/dark depending on the background to create contrast.
- Increase customizability by 400% by adding plenty new options in settings.
- Improve the color-picking preferences to show a preview instead of just the hex code.
- Fixed a bug that the background would not change after changing it in settings.
- Massive code reformatting and removal of duplicated code.
- Added README.md along with other repository updates.
- Updated Android Gradle plugin and support library.

name: v2.1
body:
- Made Ocquarium tablet-compatible
- Added a back button in the toolbar of the application settings
- Added an application shortcut to settings for 7.1 and above (API 25+)
- Added a settings icon in the app info screen for 7.0 and 7.1

name: v2.0
body: - Added screensaver functionality (Thanks to Impossible pictures' suggestion on Google Play) - Made app indexable by Google Search - Added application preferences backup

name: v1.0
body:
First release of Ocquarium, yay!

- Adaptive icon for Android Oreo 8.0 and above
- Standalone application with an icon in the app drawer
- Allows launching the usual easter egg way
- Fully open source!
